alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 8:06PM PST until January 16 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington
